if(password!==confirmPassword){setErrorMessage("Passwords don't match.");return;}try{const response=await fetch('/register',{method:'POST',credentials:'include',// required???
headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({username,password})});if(response.ok){// If registration is successful, redirect to the login page or dashboard
